Texts.Eng: +7% Fire, Electric, Ice, and Poison Resistance

Texts.Chs: 只要你有足够的能量，被动会以1能量：1像素的比例来将你获得的一半像素转化为经验。像素转换效率为50%，每2个像素转换1点XP。这个技能不会影响你已经拥有的像素，但会影响售卖物品获得的像素。
Texts.Eng: As long as you have enough Energy, drain 1 Energy/Pixel to transmute half of all Pixels you gain into Experience. Pixels are converted with 50% efficiency, for a rate of 1 XP per 2 Pixels. This ability will not affect Pixels you already have, but will affect pixels gained from selling items.

Texts.Chs: 造成元素伤害后提高对相应元素的50%抗性，持续10秒。
Texts.Eng: Doing Elemental Damage provides +50% Resistance to that element for 10 seconds.

Texts.Chs: 炼金术士工作台允许你制作可以投掷的魔药！
Texts.Eng: The Alchemist Station allows you craft throwable potions!
